questions.question_text: Which of the following would be the MOST effective way to present quarterly reports to the board on the status of the information security program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. An information security dashboard

An information security dashboard provides a concise and visual representation of key information security metrics and KPIs in a format that is easy to understand at a glance. It allows board members to quickly assess the overall health and performance of the information security program, identify trends, and track progress towards security goals. Dashboards often include charts, graphs, and other visual elements that make it easier to communicate complex information in a way that is both informative and accessible to a non-technical audience like a board of directors.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST way to obtain support for a new organization-wide information security program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Establishing an information security strategy committee is the best way to obtain support for a new organization-wide information security program because it brings together key stakeholders from different parts of the organization to help define and implement the program. This helps to ensure that the program aligns with the overall business goals and objectives and that it has the support and commitment of key stakeholders. The committee can also help to communicate the benefits and importance of the program to the wider organization, and ensure that everyone understands their role in supporting and implementing the program.
